page.title: 02Thornton Road,Thornton
page.content: In our area the main use of land was for farming, mainly grazing.The second major use of land was for housing. There was only one estate{(Ash Tree {Ave.)}.There were only two sources of employment the{International Meat {Factory}and{Simmonites Land Rover {Garage}. A woman we interviewed said the buses were not frequent after peak hours,and said that there was only The White Horse Inn for entertainment.There was a disused railway line going through a tunnel to Denholme and under the main road leading to Clayton.
